trivia_items.text: With the introduction of both Il Siracusano and A Flurry to the Flame, Gavial the Invincible is now one of several alternate Operators who share the same faction as their original version (Rhodes Island). So far this includes Specter the Unchained, Texas the Omertosa, Kirin R Yato, and Rathalos S Noir Corne.
Gavial the Invincible is one of the few characters in Arknights who wears revealing clothes (not including outfits)
